amendment.description: To provide compensation to the citizens of Fernley, Nevada damaged by the failure of the Truckee Canal.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4734 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4734 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3950-3951, S3960; text: CR S3950-3951) To provide compensation to the citizens of Fernley, Nevada damaged by the failure of the Truckee Canal.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4734 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 4707.
